content:
IExtensionCollection<T> Interface

Definition

A collection of the stem.ServiceModel.IExtension`1 objects that allow for retrieving the stem.ServiceModel.IExtension`1 by its type.

In this Article

public interface IExtensionCollection<T> : System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.ServiceModel.IExtension<T>>, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.ServiceModel.IExtension<T>> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>

Type Parameters

T

The type of the extension objects.

Methods

Find<E>()

Finds the specified extension object in the collection.

public E Find<E> ();
Returns
E

The extension object that was found.

Remarks

Find(E) returns an extension that implements (is or derives from) the specified type. If more than one extension implements the specified type, one is returned. The WCF implementation returns the most recently added, but this is not required of implementations. If no extension implements the specified type, Find(E) returns null.

FindAll<E>()

Finds all extension object in the collection specified by E.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection<E> FindAll<E> ();
Returns
Collection<E>

A collection of all extension objects in the collection that implement the specified type.
